name: The Dale Dress SAMPLE SALE
description: -AS SEEN IN AMERICAN COWBOY, DECEMBER 2013- -FEATURED IN DIRT ROAD DAUGHTERS MAGAZINE- The Dale Dress is our tribute to the Queen of the West, Dale Evans. Each dress is meticulously constructed by hand, one at a time, in our shop. Sturdy stretch cotton twill hugs your curves perfectly, accentuating your figure. Contrast yokes on the front bodice, front skirt and back skirt feature lots of piping; pearl snaps and hand-embroidered arrow tacks at each side vent complete this look. The softly rounded neckline falls into a flattering shallow V in the back. Fully lined in silky charmeuse; side zipper closure. *Belt not included COLORS: -Red version features cream and baby pink yokes with dark brown piping. -Coral version features cream and floral yokes with dark brown piping. -ALSO AVAILABLE IN CUSTOM COLORS - In stock colors: Black, Olive Green, Cotton Candy Pink, Coral, Red, Turquoise, Vintage Aqua. *We can also find any color you desire and sew a custom dress just for you!* *The Dale Dress has been referred to as "Patsy Cline meets Mad Men" by Fiona Richards at Cafe Cartolina - we agree!* Available with cap sleeves (standard), 3/4 sleeves or sleeveless - please make a note when ordering if you would prefer one of these sleeve options. 3/4 sleeves are an additional $25. **This dress is made to order, please allow 2-4 weeks for production time before shipment. Thanks!** Don't see your size? We offer custom sizing, contact us and we will make it happen! Please see our size chart for sizing information. Please see our size chart for sizing information 95% Cotton 5% Lycra **Handmade in the U.S. of A.** **International buyers, please see our shipping policy on our Policies page before purchase. Thanks!** All styles available for wholesale with low minimums, please contact us for more info.

name: The Kitty Dress
description: The Kitty Dress is our newest dress style, a variation of our best-selling Dale Dress! Kitty features a full circle skirt in a shorter length, perfect for dancing the night away or staying cool on a hot summer day. This dress also features 3/4 length sleeves with shotgun cuffs and shiny pearl snaps - completely retro-cool. The classic western "smile" pockets are sized just right to hold all your essentials - cash, cards, lipstick, phone and more! • Standard skirt length is approx. 21" - knee length (26") option available for an extra fee in the drop down menu. Each dress is meticulously constructed by hand, one at a time, in our shop. Sturdy stretch cotton twill hugs your curves perfectly, accentuating your figure. Contrast yokes on the front bodice and cuffs feature lots of piping; pearl snaps and hand-embroidered arrow tacks complete this look. The softly rounded neckline falls into a flattering shallow V in the back. Bodice is fully lined in silky charmeuse, skirt unlined; back zipper closure. *Belt not included • COLORS AVAILABLE - In stock colors: Black, Olive Green, Cotton Candy Pink, Coral, Red, Turquoise (pictured), Vintage Aqua, Seafoam (pictured). *We can also find any color you desire and sew a custom dress just for you!* • KNEE LENGTH SKIRT AVAILABLE - make sure to add the "Knee Length Skirt" option to your cart if desired. The extra skirt length adds quite a bit to the fabric cost, so there is an extra fee. • ALSO AVAILABLE WITH CAP SLEEVES OR SLEEVELESS - please make a note when ordering if you would prefer one of these options! **This dress is made to order, please allow 2-4 weeks for production time before shipment. Thanks!** Don't see your size? We offer custom "Made-to-Measure" sizing for an extra fee, contact us and we will make it happen! Please see our size chart for sizing information. 95% Cotton 5% Lycra **Handmade in the U.S. of A.** **International buyers, please see our shipping policy on our Policies page before purchase. Thanks!** All items available for wholesale with low minimums, please contact us for more info.

name: Custom Rhinestone Setting Service
description: YOU BRING IT, I'LL BLING IT! Love your Rockin' B skirt/dress/blouse but want a little more flash for your outfit? Have an amazing vintage western shirt or jacket that you'd love to see sparkle? Jeans that need some bling? I can help! • This service is available as an add-on for ANY of my Rockin' B Clothing garments • Mail-In service also available for your existing garments: western shirts, jackets, jeans, etc. Purchasing this item is a deposit towards your rhinestone order and guarantees your spot in my production queue. Once I receive your order, I will contact you via email to discuss your needs/wants/likes and give you the final price. **This deposit is non-refundable!** Please contact me prior to making your deposit with any questions, etc. • FINAL PRICE FOR THIS SERVICE IS CALCULATED BY: 1. Number of stones and settings used 2. Complexity of pattern (labor) 3. Complexity of garment (will I have do undo and re-sew a lining to set the rhinestones?) STANDARD STONE SIZE IS 20ss, larger or smaller stones are available if requested. Price will change based on the size of stones - larger stones cost more! SWAROVSKI stones are my standard choice. ALL STONES ARE SET WITH TIFFANY PRONG SETTINGS IN AN INDUSTRIAL KICK PRESS MACHINE. THEY ARE NOT GLUED ON. THESE ARE PERMANENT AND CAN WITHSTAND REPEATED CLEANING! Rim settings are also available if requested. •• Standard pricing estimates: (please note these are base prices and all services are quoted individually to each client via email) •• • Embroidered western shirt (Rockmount, Scully, etc.) - $65 • Rockin' B Kitty Dress - $60 • Rockin' B Dale Dress - $50 • Rockin' B skirt - $40

name: Retro Cowgirl Football Jersey Tee - Ladies
description: Designed in the spirit of vintage rodeo posters from the 1930s-1950s, this eye-popping tee features a beautiful cowgirl and her trusty steed. This gorgeous piece of wearable art was illustrated and designed by Rockin' B designer Jessica Snell. Completely custom and exclusive! Printed on a super soft football-style tee, this is Rockin' B's favorite t-shirt cut EVER! Extra length makes this a great tee to wear with jeans. Available in red. Very fitted junior style cut, featuring a flattering v-neck. Content: 50/50 Cotton/Poly. • Made in the USA!! • Sizing: Please note that this style is cut in Juniors sizing, therefore this style runs a bit small and is very fitted, but has a lot of stretch. • Small: 30" - 36" bust • Medium: 32" - 38" bust • Large: 34" - 40" bust • X-Large: 36 - 44" bust Design and artwork ©2013 Rockin' B Design LLC. All items available for wholesale with low minimums, please contact us for more info.

name: Rodeo Sweetheart Dress
description: -FEATURED ON WESTERN GLAMOUR- The Rodeo Sweetheart dress puts a western twist on a classic 1950s style. The full circle skirt will have you dancing the night away, and looks great with or without a crinoline. Sweetheart neckline shaping accentuates your positives and features contrast piping with shiny pearl snaps. The front pockets are fully functional and also feature floral-print lining and contrast piping with hand-embroidered arrow tacks. Each dress is meticulously constructed by hand, one at a time, in our shop. Finest quality stretch cotton twill hugs your curves perfectly while allowing plenty of ease for dancing! Bodice lined in silky nude charmeuse, skirt unlined; back zipper closure. *Crinoline not included **This dress is made to order, please allow 2-4 weeks for production time before shipment. Thanks!** Style #12003 Don't see your size? We offer custom sizing for an additional fee, contact us and we will make it happen! Please see our size chart for sizing information. 95% Cotton 5% Lycra **Handmade in the U.S. of A.** **International buyers, please see our shipping policy on our Policies page before purchase. Thanks!** All items available for wholesale with low minimums, please contact us for more info.

name: Deco Vegas Jacket
description: An absolute showstopper, this spectacular jacket turns heads everywhere it goes! Featuring an elegant, slender cut; the high collar and French cuffs are accented with pops of aqua contrast. Elegant rows of hand-set gold studs and Swarovski crystals radiate outward against deepest black, perfectly accenting the female figure. Flashy and fabulous, this gorgeous jacket is perfect for an evening out or your next western competition! Fully lined in silky charmeuse, with a front zipper closure. Made to measure - production time is 2-4 weeks. Rockin’ B Show Clothing offers one of a kind design, expert tailoring and fit, beautiful details and excellent customer service. Each garment is made with only the the finest leather, fabric, and Swarovski crystals. -Haute Show Style to Last a Lifetime!- Designed and made by Rockin’ B owner Jessica Snell, each style is 100% handcrafted in California - Jess does all patternmaking, sewing, embellishment and handpainting. Each garment is sewn on industrial sewing equipment and is fully lined to ensure the highest quality product you will ever buy! Shell: Poly blend suiting Lining: Charmeuse -Spot clean only, do not immerse, do not dry clean- Shipping includes insurance and delivery confirmation. Custom jackets always available, please email Jess for more information.

name: Southwest Blanket Stripe Jacket
description: -BRAND NEW STYLE!- Our Blanket Jacket features a cheerful woven blanket stripe, cut in Rockin' B Clothing's signature Broken Arrow style; the gorgeous feminine silhouette and impeccable tailoring are reminiscent of classic vintage style. Southwest inspired, with metallic leather and pink lambskin appliques on the yokes. Fabulously retro "smile" welts with pink piping and hand-embroidered arrow tacks accent the front of the jacket; each sleeve features leather shotgun cuffs with shiny pearl snaps for a true vintage look. Each jacket is meticulously constructed by hand, one at a time, in our shop. The flattering notched collar rolls gracefully downward, offering a lovely neckline to showcase your favorite turquoise necklace. This is a fabulous jacket for your polished western wardrobe, and can be customized extensively for rodeo pageants or other events. • COLORS AVAILABLE: Red stripe (pictured), Black stripe, Ivory stripe Rockin' B specializes in custom embroidery, custom handpainting, Swarovski rhinestone embellishment, leather applique and more. The Broken Arrow is also available without embellishment for a classic look with boots and jeans, and can be made for you in any color or pattern your heart desires. For custom jacket pricing and questions, please email Jess directly. Fully lined, three button closure. Also available with bracelet length sleeves upon request. Style #15002 This jacket is made to order, please allow 2-4 weeks for production time before shipment. Customized jackets may have a longer production time, again please contact Jess for more information. Rush orders available for an additional fee. Don't see your size? We offer custom sizing for an additional fee, contact us and we will make it happen! Please see our size chart for sizing information. -AVAILABLE IN CUSTOM COLORS AND PRINTS -  We can find any color you desire and sew a custom jacket just for you! Price may increase based on fabric choice and additional embellishment. **Handcrafted in the U.S.A.** **International buyers, please see our shipping policy on our Policies page before purchase. Thanks!** All items are available for wholesale with low minimums, please contact us for more info if you are a retail store interested in carrying Rockin' B Clothing!

name: Sacred Heart Show Jacket
description: The Sacred Heart show jacket features gorgeous handpainted leather applique, a customizable banner across the upper back, hundreds of Swarovski rhinestones (sizes ss20 and ss12), classic piped "smile" welts, and vintage-style shotgun cuffs. Completely one of a kind, this jacket is fully lined in silky stretch charmeuse for comfort, and has a center front zip. Please click HERE for more detail photos. Please make sure to specify the word/phrase you would like for the banner when checking out. Sized to fit a Misses medium (6-8) to a smaller Misses large (8-10). Cannot be taken down in size due the appliques. Rockin’ B Show Clothing offers one of a kind design, expert tailoring and fit, beautiful details and excellent customer service. Each garment is sewn on industrial sewing equipment and is fully lined to ensure the highest quality product you will ever buy! Shell: Poly/acrylic blend Lining: 100% poly stretch charmeuse Decoration: lambskin, painted leather -Spot clean only, do not immerse, do not dry clean- -DO NOT rub the painted leather, to clean dab with a slightly damp cloth. DO NOT RUB, DO NOT WET- Shipping includes insurance and delivery confirmation Custom jackets always available, please email Jess for more information.

name: Western Wiggle Skirt
description: The Western Wiggle is our version of a classic pencil skirt, with a curvy twist. Featuring inset yokes highlighted with apricot piping, two faux smile pockets complete with embroidered arrowheads, an eye-catching row of buttons... this skirt aims to please. Each skirt is meticulously constructed by hand, one at a time, in our shop. Sturdy stretch cotton hugs your curves perfectly, accentuating your figure. name: Desert Rose Western Jacket
description:
-AS SEEN ON CNBC's HIT SHOW TREASURE DETECTIVES!-

-THE BROKEN ARROW JACKET IN DESERT ROSE-

This particular jacket is the Desert Rose, featuring a handpainted rose motif on the back yoke, accented with Swarovski rhinestones in tiffany settings. Jackets are totally customizable with any design imaginable, handpainted or embroidered! The Broken Arrow Jacket is our signature jacket, featuring a gorgeous feminine silhouette and impeccable tailoring reminiscent of classic vintage style. Each jacket is meticulously constructed by hand, one at a time, in our shop. This allows us to customize your jacket specifically for you! Rockin' B specializes in custom embroidery, custom handpainting, Swarovski rhinestone embellishment, leather applique and more. The Broken Arrow is also available without embellishment for a classic look with boots and jeans, and can be made for you in any color or pattern your heart desires. Each jacket features our signature three piece piped sleeve, cropped just above the wrist. The front of the jacket features piped "smile" vents, which are capped with hand-embroidered arrow tacks. The back is carefully shaped with a piped yoke and fitted princess seams, and features hand-embroidered arrow tacks for vintage western flair. The flattering notched collar rolls gracefully downward, offering a lovely neckline to showcase your favorite turquoise necklace. This is a fabulous jacket for your polished western wardrobe, and can be customized extensively for rodeo pageants or other events. For custom jacket pricing and questions, please email Jess directly. The featured custom jacket in this listing is the "Desert Rose" option, and can also be purchased in any size. Fully lined, three button closure. Also available with wrist-length sleeves upon request. Style #15002 This jacket is made to order, please allow 2-4 weeks for production time before shipment. Customized jackets may have a longer production time, again please contact Jess for more information. Rush orders available for an additional fee. Don't see your size? We offer custom sizing, contact us and we will make it happen! Please see our size chart for sizing information. -AVAILABLE IN CUSTOM COLORS AND PRINTS -  We can find any color you desire and sew a custom jacket just for you! Price may increase based on fabric choice and additional embellishment. **Handcrafted in the U.S.A.** **International buyers, please see our shipping policy on our Policies page before purchase. Thanks!** All items are available for wholesale with low minimums, please contact us for more info if you are a retail store interested in carrying Rockin' B Clothing!

name: Prairie Rose Swing Skirt
description: Combining the peppy lines of 1940s swing skirts and vintage cowgirl style, the Prairie Rose skirt is a fabulous option for day or evening. Eight gores give this skirt a graceful silhouette and beautiful movement! Front and back yokes add shape and accentuate your figure; contrast piping and pearl snaps add cowgirl glam. Fully lined in silky nude charmeuse; back zipper closure. Each skirt is meticulously constructed one at a time in our shop, using the finest stretch cotton and twill. **This skirt is made to order, please allow 2-4 weeks for production time before shipment. name: Gift Certificate for $25, $50 or $100
description:
Rockin' B Clothing Gift Certificate, can be used to purchase items online. Never expires!

You have the option of choosing a hard copy certificate mailed directly to you or your recipient, or we can email the gift certificate to you. Simply include the delivery address or email in the comments section when you order.

All mailed certificates are sent via the USPS in a swanky vintage-style airmail envelope.

Wanting to give an amount that is not available here? Simply contact us via the form in the sidebar, and we'll gladly create a custom gift certificate for you.

name: Ranch Hand Clutch - Many Colors Available!
description: -LIMITED EDITION- Spacious and fully lined, our Ranch Hand Clutch is sure to be the envy of all the cowgirls in the West. Three classic pearl snaps are perfectly placed on the fun saddle shaped flap to keep all contents secure. The ribbon handle gives any gal the freedom to swing the night away. Measures approx. 9" wide by 5" tall when folded/closed. **Handmade in the U.S. of A.** All items available for wholesale with low minimums, please contact us for more info.
